fifthSection.description: Gataca Studio is the most comprehensive tool on the market to deploy decentralized identity solutions
fifthSection.title: How it works

firstSection.description: Issue digitized, standardized, and tamper-proof government documents and prompt eID & e-government services adoption
firstSection.title: Government

fourthSection.description: Accelerate economic growth with Self-Sovereign Identity
fourthSection.title: Why Gataca

steps.description: Governments around the world are dedicated to digitalizing the public sector. However, they are encountering difficulties in promoting citizen eID adoption and digital inclusion in e-government services. These challenges stem from usability, interoperability, and security features in existing systems and processes
steps.title: Challenge

steps.description: Our end-to-end solution empowers authorities to issue tamper-proof Verifiable Credentials for various government documents, including national IDs, passports, driver's licenses, and business permits. These credentials are then securely shared to a citizen's ID Wallet, which gives them control over who can access their data and enables Single Sign-On authentication to access digital services both in the public and private sectors
steps.title: Solution

thirdSection.description: Boost digital transformation and start improving citizens' day-to-day lives

list.description: Issue tamper-proof government documents in a standard, digital format that can be securely shared globally
list.title: Issuance of government documents

list.description: Allow secure identity verification of citizens in the public and private sectors by empowering the use of Verifiable IDs
list.title: Citizen identity verification

list.description: Drive accessibility to e-government services, including tax filing, license applications, fine payments, and more
list.title: Access to E-government services

list.description: Allocate easily and soundly government benefits, such as social benefits or grant applications to citizens
list.title: Benefit transfer

list.description: Securely verify voters' identity and ensure the voting process's integrity
list.title: Electronic voting
